timeline.message:
[aws-storage-s3] Test against StorageCategory not Amplify

Amplify is a process-wide singleton, that can be configured only once.
It maintains state until the process dies. This is true of its reference
to the Amplify.Storage category (and its pluings) as well.

This is a brittle way to test the functionality of storage. Better is to
create fresh instances of the StorageCategory, and run assertions
against them.
